name: part_000
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】遂に復帰‼重大告知ライブ【#星街すいせい重大告知】 [CPUYPXa7D7s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro montage featuring on-screen text and a compilation of Hoshimachi Suisei's visuals, teasing the live event.
3D live performance of the song 'Stellar Stellar' by Hoshimachi Suisei on a grand stage with dynamic lighting.

subtitles.original: November 4th 21:00 LIVE START! 重大告知ライブ
subtitles.english: November 4th 21:00 LIVE START! Major Announcement Live

subtitles.original: Starring 星街すいせい
subtitles.english: Starring Hoshimachi Suisei

subtitles.original: LIVE START
subtitles.english: LIVE START

subtitles.original: だって僕は星じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because I'm not a star...

subtitles.original: Stellar Stellar 作詞：星街すいせい / 作曲：TAKU INOUE
subtitles.english: Stellar Stellar Lyrics: Hoshimachi Suisei / Composition: TAKU INOUE

subtitles.original: きっと君はもう気付いていた
subtitles.english: I'm sure you had already noticed

subtitles.original: 僕の心の奥で描いた
subtitles.english: What I drew deep inside my heart

subtitles.original: それがこれから話す陳腐な
subtitles.english: That is the hackneyed...

subtitles.original: モノローグさ
subtitles.english: ...monologue I'm about to tell

subtitles.original: ずっと言えない言葉があった
subtitles.english: There were words I could never say

subtitles.original: 壊せない壁だったんだ
subtitles.english: They were a wall I couldn't break

subtitles.original: ずっとさ
subtitles.english: All this time

subtitles.original: ふっと香る排気ガスの匂いが
subtitles.english: The sudden scent of exhaust fumes

subtitles.original: どうしようもなく憎らしくて
subtitles.english: I hated it so much I couldn't help it

subtitles.original: 部屋の隅で膝を抱えて
subtitles.english: Crouched in the corner of my room

subtitles.original: 震えていた
subtitles.english: I was trembling

subtitles.original: 太陽なんていらないから
subtitles.english: I don't need the sun

subtitles.original: 明けないでいて
subtitles.english: So please, don't let the dawn break

subtitles.original: その手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Stretch out your hand

subtitles.original: 誰かに届くように
subtitles.english: So it can reach someone

subtitles.original: 僕だって君と同じ
subtitles.english: I'm just the same as you

subtitles.original: 特別なんかじゃないから
subtitles.english: I'm not special at all

subtitles.original: 何者かになりたくて
subtitles.english: I just wanted to be someone

subtitles.original: そうさ僕は夜を歌う Stellar Stellar
subtitles.english: That's right, I sing of the night, Stellar Stellar

subtitles.original: ありったけの輝き放って
subtitles.english: Emitting all the radiance I have

subtitles.original: 呼ぶ声はずっとずっと止まない
subtitles.english: The calling voices will never, ever stop

subtitles.original: そうさ僕はずっと泣きたかったのは
subtitles.english: That's right, the one I've always wanted to cry for

subtitles.original: 待ってるシンデレラじゃないさ
subtitles.english: Isn't the waiting Cinderella

subtitles.original: 迎えに行く王子様だ
subtitles.english: But the Prince going to get her

subtitles.original: だって僕は星じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because I'm not a star...

subtitles.original: なんてありふれた話なんだ
subtitles.english: What a common story it is

subtitles.original: いつまで書き連ねていた
subtitles.english: How long was I writing it out?

subtitles.original: ノートの隅に眠るほんのワンシーンだ
subtitles.english: It's just a single scene sleeping in the corner of a notebook

subtitles.original: きっとあの星も泣いてるんだ
subtitles.english: I'm sure that star is crying too

subtitles.original: 明日なんて来ないままでいて
subtitles.english: So let tomorrow never come

subtitles.original: その手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Stretch out your hand

subtitles.original: 誰かに届くように
subtitles.english: So it can reach someone

subtitles.original: 本当に大切なものは
subtitles.english: The things that are truly important

subtitles.original: 目に見えないみたいなんだ
subtitles.english: Seem to be invisible to the eye

subtitles.original: そうさ僕は夜を歌う Stellar Stellar
subtitles.english: That's right, I sing of the night, Stellar Stellar
